a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Numeracy skills of adults young adults and adults, 2015
Numeracy is defined as the ability to understand and communicate mathematical information, applying it to
situations and problems using various representations.
PIAAC: Mean young adult numeracy proficiency
Data source: OECD via World Bank (2023)
Note: Young adults are aged 16-24, while the adult age range is 15-65.
